purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need for   Pneumococcal Vaccine - Adult and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Data Element Scope: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need for   Pneumococcal Vaccine - Adult and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need for   Pneumococcal Vaccine - Adult and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Care Need for   Pneumococcal Vaccine - Adult and utilization in patients/users connected health.)

contains.display: Pneumococcal conjugate vaccine, 13 valent (PCV13), for intramuscular use
Pneumococcal polysaccharide vaccine, 23-valent (PPSV23), adult or immunosuppressed patient dosage, when administered to individuals 2 years or older, for subcutaneous or intramuscular use
